suggestions.reasoning: Lower confluence thresholds (25 vs 30) to capture missed trades with avg gap of 28.4. Relaxed volume requirements since 20.8% of missed trades had normal volume. Tiered profit-taking (1.5%, 3.5%, 6.5%) with partial exits to reduce early exit impact while protecting gains. Conservative 0.8% stop-loss to maintain low max drawdown advantage.

The current confluence_gap_min (30) is too restrictive given missed trades averaged 28.4. Lowering both confluence parameters to 25 should capture more profitable setups. Adding 'normal' volume allows entry on 20.8% more opportunities where high volume wasn't present but trades were still profitable. The tiered take-profit system (25% at 0.8%, 50% at 1.5%, 25% at 2.5%) addresses early exits by letting portions run longer while securing some gains. The 1.2% stop loss balances the max drawdown risk with the improved profit targets.
